technical_skills: Image preprocessing methods (e.g., normalization, augmentation, filtering)
soft_skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
Proven ability to collaborate with multidisciplinary teams

key_responsibilities: Design, train, and deploy deep learning models (e.g., CNNs) for fine-grained visual inspection and defect detection tasks
Apply advanced image analysis techniques such as segmentation, feature extraction, and contrast enhancement to improve model accuracy and defect visibility

key_projects: Cosmetic Grading models to classify surface conditions and assign quality grades in accordance with cosmetic standards and internal benchmarks

special_instructions: We are looking for exceptional technical talent to join our team.

strengths: Strong technical skills in computer vision and deep learning models
gaps: Limited experience working on cloud platforms

score_explanation: The candidate has strong technical skills in computer vision and deep learning models, with excellent communication and collaboration skills.
However, they lack experience working on cloud platforms and do not have industry-specific certifications.
